com.nokia.midp.examples.network.push
Class PushMIDlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      com.nokia.midp.examples.network.push.PushMIDlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class PushMIDlet
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, java.lang.Runnable

Supplies a MIDlet that can be activated in response to a connection, timer based alarm or manually by the user. Provides methods to set and unset a timer based alarm and register and unregister a connection.

Method Detail

startApp

public void startApp()
Sets up the MIDlet and starts the thread running. Sets up the display with StringItems and Commands for user interaction and starts the thread running.

pauseApp

public void pauseApp()
No implementation required.

destroyApp

public void destroyApp(boolean unconditional)
Destroys the application resources. The alarm is set if required, the resources destroyed and the thread terminated.

commandAction

public void commandAction(javax.microedition.lcdui.Command cmd,
                          javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable source)
Handles the commands on the UI.

Specified by:
commandAction in interface javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
Parameters:
cmd - the command object identifying the command
source - the displayable on which the command has occured

run

public void run()
Defines the run() method which all objects implementing the Runnable interface must do. If the MIDlet was started by a connection the connection is accepted and dealt with. The display is updated with an indication of how the MIDlet was started followed by a list of the registered connections and an indication of whether the alarm is set. A while loop is then entered to wait for connections to be registered and unregistered or the alarm to be set.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

regConnection

public void regConnection()
Registers or unregisters a connection depending on the boolean flag. After registering or unregistering the connection the user is returned to the midlet's main display and updates the list of current connections.

setAlarm

public void setAlarm()
Handles the registering of an alarm.

displayConnections

public void displayConnections()
Creates a list of all the registered connections.

displayAlert

public void displayAlert(java.lang.String alertText)
Displays an alert to the user with the desired text.

stopThread

public void stopThread()
Terminates the thread.

exit

public void exit()
Releases all resources if they have not already been.
